description:
An officer data collaborating with NIJISANJI's VTuber "Ibrahim" for "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening". Ibrahim will appear as "Ib Rahim", an officer living in the Sengoku Era Japan.
There will also be an event by Ibrahim, depicting new endings of the Honnōji Incident.

- How to Apply
Select "Edit Officer", choose "Active" under "Extra Officers"  > "Active/Standby" to make "Ib Rahim" appear in the game.
Events featuring "Ib Rahim", such as "Escape from Honnōji - Ib Rahim" will occur when starting the game with the officer "Ib Rahim" activated for a certain scenario, such as "Like A Dream" with the Oda (Nobunaga) Clan, and when certain conditions are met before "The Honnōji Incident" occurs.

Note: This content will be available for purchase by November 20th, 2023. If the content was downloaded within the defined deadline, you can continue playing this content afterwards.
name: New Officer Data for "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening" Collaborating NIJISANJI's VTuber "Ibrahim"
